skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Forbin, a L'Adroit-class destroyer from Iris Libre. For various reasons, I was stuck in port for two years, but after returning to service, I was able to get a lot done and make up for some of that lost time on the battlefield.
skins.acquisition: I am Forbin, a squire from Iris Libre. I may not match up to the stature of my seniors, but please offer me your guidance!
skins.login: Hooo! Haah! Oh, Commander, let's do our warm-up exercises together!
skins.details: Hooh! Haah! Oh, great timing, Commander! Let's practice some swordplay!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Iron Blood or Royal Navy, I don't care who it is, I just want to learn more about them!
skins.secretaryIdle2: When will I become as strong and cool as the knights?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I don't want my life to end without having accomplished anything... so this time, I'll give it my all!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, did you know that there are many different kinds of swords? For example, there are rapiers, sabres, flamberges, and so on...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I didn't mean to draw my sword upon someone unarmed... I am very sorry.

skins.shipDescription: My hard work has finally paid off! Commander, thank you for your guidance all this time! I'll return the favor by bringing you even more honors in battle!
skins.acquisition: My hard work has finally paid off! Commander, thank you for your guidance all this time! I'll return the favor by bringing you even more honors in battle!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Looks like there are plenty of folks in the Sakura Empire who understand the way of the sword. I'd love to meet with them sometime.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I still fall short compared to the other knights, but I'm in no rush. Slowly but surely, I know I'll be able to catch up to them.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hnn! Haah! Oh... I started swinging my sword again without even realizing it...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, are you trying to see what's different about me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey, there's nothing different about that place... Are you doing this on purpose?!

skins.shipDescription: It's good to be able to stop and smell the roses every now and then. Um, Commander, would you be able to accompany me a bit longer?
skins.acquisition: It's good to be able to stop and smell the roses every now and then. Um, Commander, would you be able to accompany me a bit longer?
skins.details: Would you like some fresh fruit, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: We don't usually get such fresh apples and tomatoes, so how about a mixed juice? It's good for your health!
skins.secretaryIdle2: No more fighting, no more wars... That's the peace that we're fighting to reclaim.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I heard that aromatherapy can help you recover from fatigue. Why don't you try growing some flowers?
skins.secretaryTouch: I know the other knights went out of their way to pick this dress for me... but I'm not used to all the frills and whatnot...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eep! N-next time, I won't hold back!

skins.shipDescription: Even though I'm an Iris Libre squire, I'm currently working hard to have a rich student life. Um... maybe this is a bit too laid back?
skins.acquisition: Even though I'm an Iris Libre squire, I'm currently working hard to have a rich student life. Um... maybe this is a bit too laid back?
skins.details: I joined the Kendo Club. I'm thinking it'll be good to hone my swordsmanship skills against my peers and build up my streng¡ª Huh? What do you mean it's a different kind of sword!?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, have you seen Le Mars? If she's slacking off again, I don't know how she thinks she's going to pass the exam...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Study is much like swordsmanship, you have to take it seriously if you want to improve.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, your collar's all twisted. Hold still, I'll get it¡ª There, that's better!
skins.secretaryTouch: Aie! The wind! ...Erm!? Commander!? You, you didn't see anything, did you?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: S- such filthy, immoral behavior... You can't do this, Commander!

skins.shipDescription: Good evening, Commander. I am currently enjoying the party in the company of my friends, as my duties as a squire entail. Um... I've had a bit too much to drink? R-really...?
skins.acquisition: Good evening, Commander. I am currently enjoying the party in the company of my friends, as my duties as a squire entail. Um... I've had a bit too much to drink? R-really...?
